data.title: Nikko Ibarreta
data.meta_description: Nikko ibarreta.pptx - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .pptx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. The document summarizes various arts and crafts from the Mindanao region in the Philippines, including pottery, wood carving, and architectural designs. It notes that pottery from archaeological sites reveals the artistic traditions of ancient Mindanao societies. Wood carving features curvilinear designs depicting animals and plants. Common motifs in carving include the Tausug manuk-manuk bird and the Maranao sarimanok bird. Architectural designs incorporate serpent or dragon figures and vine-and-leaf patterns on protruding beams, expressing the wealth and status of noble occupants.
